Fast-Food Rapidly Description: Mary is running a fast-food restaurant, the things she made is very delicious. More and more people like to order her fast-food. Today she is really very busy and has to need your help. Please help her now! Give her a fast-food rapidly. Played Count: 14946 Instructions: This game is played with mouse only.
